testcase.classname: To verify the account creation feature in orikan website
testcase.name: To create an new account in orikan site
testcase.system-out: Given To launch the browser and launch orikan url...........................passed When To pass datas into email, password, confirm password into required text box and click next button.passed And To pass datas into firstname, lastname, address, postcode, city in required field.passed And To select state in state drop down and click next.......................passed And To pass datas into holdername, cardnumber, cvvnumber, expiry year in required field.passed And To select master card and choose state and click next...................passed And To enable agreement checkbox and click submit...........................passed And To verify the text account is successfully registered...................passed Then To close browser.......................................................passed

testcase.classname: To verify the account creation feature in orikan website
testcase.name: To create and account with another email
testcase.system-out: Given To launch the browser and launch orikan url...........................passed When To pass datas into email, password, confirm password field.............passed And To click login button...................................................passed
